bibl.title: Thomas Reddington and Patrick Gallagher v. William Cochrane. Testimony
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: Third Judicial District of Washington Territory

body.p: In the District Court of the Third Judicial District of Washington Territory, holding terms at Seattle for the Counties of King and Kitsap
The Territory of Washington v. Thomas Reddington + Patrick Gallagher

I, William Cochrane, Sheriff of said King County, Washington Territory do hereby certify that I received the within writ of Habeas Corpus on the 29th day of September, 1887, and for return threto state the following: That I have the said Thomas Reddington and Patrick Gallagher by virtue of a committment for the crime of murder in the first degree, from H.F. Jones a Justice of the Peace in and for Seattle Precinct King County, Washington Territory, a true copy of which is hereto annexed, and the original bring with costs, as also the said Thomas Reddington and Patrick Gallagher as
by said Writ commanded to do.
Territory of Washington } ss County of King
William Cochrane being first duly sworn on oath says, that the foregoing return is true
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 30th day of Sept. 1887
L.H. Piles Notary Public, Wash. Ty.
